title: Our Community Guidelines
header: A Space for Authentic Connections and Personal Growth

introduction.p1: Welcome to our community of dedicated coaches and individuals committed to growth. Our mission is to create a platform where personal growth and development can thrive through safe, respectful, and meaningful human connections.
introduction.p2: These guidelines are the foundation of that mission. They are a shared agreement to uphold the integrity and authenticity of our community. By using this platform, you agree to uphold this spirit.

authenticity.title: Create Genuine Connections
authenticity.text: Our platform thrives on genuine, human connections. We encourage you to be authentic and create a space where others feel safe and understood.

respect.title: Communicate with Respect
respect.text: We are a diverse community. Disagreements may happen, but disrespect and harassment will not be tolerated. Always engage in constructive and empathetic communication.

trust.title: Maintain Authenticity and Trust
trust.text: Your identity and your experiences are the foundation of trust on this platform. Be honest in what you share and respectful in your feedback.

safety.title: Ensure Safety and Privacy
safety.text: Protect your own privacy and respect the privacy of others. Do not share personal contact information or conduct sessions outside of the platform's secure environment.

rules.title: Specific Platform Rules
rules.intro: To ensure clarity, the following activities are prohibited. Violating these rules will lead to moderation actions as outlined in the "Consequences" section.

profile.title: Profile & Identity Integrity
profile.impersonation: Impersonation or Fake Profiles: You may not impersonate another person or entity. Coaches must provide accurate information regarding their qualifications.
profile.content: Inappropriate Profile Content: Your profile picture, name, and bio must be respectful and free of offensive or hateful content.

communication.title: Content & Communication Standards
communication.harassment: Harassment or Bullying: Abusive language, personal attacks, threats, or any form of intimidation directed at another user is strictly forbidden.
communication.hateSpeech: Hate Speech: Content that promotes discrimination or disparages individuals based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, or other characteristics is not allowed.
communication.spam: Spam or Scams: Unsolicited promotional content, repetitive messages, phishing attempts, or any form of financial scam is prohibited.
communication.inappropriate: Inappropriate Content: Do not share content that is sexually explicit, graphically violent, or otherwise not in keeping with a supportive and safe coaching environment.

consequences.title: Our Moderation Process & Consequences
consequences.intro: We use a combination of automated systems and human review to enforce these guidelines. When content is reported, our Trust & Safety team reviews it against these policies.

threeStrikes.title: The "Three Strikes" System
threeStrikes.intro: For most violations, we follow an escalating system to provide an opportunity for education and correction.
threeStrikes.strike1: Strike 1: Formal Warning. You will receive an official notification detailing the violation. This is logged on your account.
threeStrikes.strike2: Strike 2: Final Warning. A second violation will result in a more sternly worded warning, stating that a further violation will lead to suspension.
threeStrikes.strike3: Strike 3: Account Suspension. A third violation will result in a temporary, read-only suspension of your account.

severeViolations.title: Severe Violations
severeViolations.text: Please note that severe offenses (e.g., threats of violence, illegal activity) may result in immediate and permanent account suspension, bypassing the strike system.

appeals.title: The Appeal Process
appeals.intro: If you believe a moderation action taken on your account was in error, you have the right to appeal. All notifications regarding moderation actions contain a link to initiate an appeal, which will open a support ticket for our team to review.

conclusion: Thank you for being a constructive member of our community and helping us build a platform for genuine human growth.
